thread.title: Supply Risks Support Oil Near Three-Year High

author: Sarah McFarlane
title: Supply Risks Support Oil Near Three-Year High

organizations.name: supply risks support oil near three-year high oil

text:
Oil prices steadied below a three-year high on Thursday, underpinned by geopolitical risks, with Nigeria the latest producer facing threats to its supply.
Brent crude, the global oil benchmark, fell 0.02% to $69.36 a barrel on Londonâ€™s ICE Futures exchange. On the New York Mercantile Exchange, West Texas Intermediate futures were trading down 0.02% at $63.95 a barrel.
Reports...
